channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18492] Wrong argument in the WorkloadManager.resetAndQueryKill()
item.description:
Caused by HIVE-18088, prasanth_j, could you please check this?

private void resetAndQueueKill(Map<WmTezSession, KillQueryContext> toKillQuery,
KillQueryContext killQueryContext, Map<WmTezSession, GetRequest> toReuse) {

WmTezSession toKill = killQueryContext.session;
...
if (poolState != null) {
poolState.getSessions().remove(toKill);
poolState.getInitializingSessions().remove(toKill);
...

getInitializingSessions() returns List of SessionInitContext, so toKill definitely can't be in this list and therefore no needs to remove it.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Thanks olegd for reporting. Yes. That's a bug. Would need to iterate and remove. Do you want to put up a patch for this? I can review it and get it committed.
prasanth_j, here is it. I hope this is what was expected

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12906794/HIVE-18492.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12907025 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Updated the patch for tests. Looks like something (line endings?) is making git not like the original patches.

+1 for the fix; is it easy to add a regression unit test for this? TestWorkloadManager has various tests.
Actually given the nature of the objects equals could be replaced with ==

-1 overall
